channel.title: Item "Overlap"?
channel.description:
Okay, I coded in some new customs, one being a Halo 3 helm. Now it equips in the head slot, and works fine, except that if you look at it looking down, the cape and other armour goes on top of it. Is there any way to fix these 3d settings? (Happens with some weapons as well)
Any help appreciated,
Durial12
(I have added the id in item.java and item4.java in all possible slots)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2009, 11:58:41 am[/size][hr]I've been searching for a while and have found nothing. I'm hoping i can just add the id to a list...
